detaileddescription.para: Sets default values for all parameters. Needed by GenericConnectorModel.

briefdescription.para: Copy constructor from a property object.

detaileddescription.para: Needs to be defined properly in order for GenericConnector to work.

briefdescription.para: Get all properties of this connection and put them into a dictionary.
Set properties of this connection from the values given in dictionary.
Checks to see if illegal parameters are given in syn_spec.

detaileddescription.para: The illegal parameters are: vt, A_minus, A_plus, Wmax, Wmin, b, tau_c, tau_n, tau_plus, c and n. The last two are prohibited only if we have more than one thread.

briefdescription.para: Send an event to the receiver of this connection.

parameterdescription.para: The port under which this connection is stored in the Connector.
